cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP in-streams to 0 causes SCTP association failures and prevents proper communication setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the remote N address to an unreachable IP will cause routing failures and disrupt F1 interface connectivity.
du.explanation_zh: 將遠端 N 地址設定為不可達的 IP 會導致路由失敗，並干擾 F1 接口連接。
